title: Scenario-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Organizational Learning and Knowledge Management Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical competencies for effectively applying organizational learning and knowledge management strategies in mathematics education settings

learning_goals: Learners can design learning activities based on real-world corporate scenarios to establish an organization-wide knowledge-sharing system
Through scenario analysis, learners can diagnose knowledge management issues in mathematics education settings and propose improvement strategies
Learners can develop knowledge management strategies using collaborative tools to operate effective knowledge-sharing processes with team members
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
